DialogueText.Text: Hello again! I come bearing some news! I've learned more about what we need to perform the ritual. Though I'll be honest... This may be asking too much, even for you.

Old legends by the Monks state that the Dragon King used the power of "Primordial Light" to ultimately seal away the behemoth that had devestated the Dragons, and we'll need our own source of that power to fuel the ritual. You may think we're out of luck without the Dragon King, but fear not, there's another entity I know of that might allow us to harness this power: the self-appointed "Empress of Light".

If there were any being left in this world who could channel Primordial Light as the Dragons' mighty King once did, I believe it would be her; as nauseating as her existence is. She's a graceless despot; same as the Gods. As such, I'm tasking you with slaying her. She is nothing compared to the might Dragon King, and because of this, I doubt she wields that power all on her own. I'm hopeful you'll discover the method by which she harnesses Primordial Light during your encounter with her. That is, if you're willing to face her?
Wonderful! Should you emerge victorious, your name shall certainly be engraved in legend! I wish you luck in your hunt; the Empress can be most elusive...
